articles.author: Tim Bradshaw
articles.title: Microsoft neck and neck with Apple in fight to be world's most valuable company - Financial Times
articles.description: Artificial intelligence boom propels software giant to $2.9tn market value
articles.content: Microsoft briefly usurped Apple to become the worlds biggest company by market value on Thursday, as the boom in artificial intelligence brought a new twist to the decades-long rivalry between the tw… [+2954 chars]
